message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your product has value, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This would still be a great deal for you, as you've acknowledged its value to you. Let's see if we can find common ground here.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I believe $10,000 is a fair price. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
